refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The ForeignPhrase element can be used to markup the text of a foreign word or phrase. Foreign in this context means that it is a language other than the primary language of the document and is not intended to be pejorative in any way.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: ForeignPhrases are often given special typographic treatment, such as italics.
